data.title: Median Age of Malawi 1950
data.meta_description: Learn more about Median Age of Malawi
data.text:
ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡¼ Median Age of Malawi

The current median age of Malawi's population is 17.4563 years of age. A 1.42% increase from 2023, when the median age only was 17.2118 years. In the future, Malawi's median age is projected to increase to 36.1273 years of age, by the year 2100. A total increase of the of Malawi's median age by 106.96% from today's standard.

Data Information

Data found on this page is based on the medium fertility variant of the United Nations Revision of World Population Prospects 2022.

Data Sources

The United Nations - Department of Economic and Social Affairs (Population Division)

UN Revision of World Population Prospects 2022

Data Disclaimer

People at database.earth has not verified data entry and collection processes in person. We take all open data provided by governmental and non-governmental organization at face value.

This data is the foundation for most content and visualization found on this page. If you find errors in the representation of the data, please contact us and we will correct it.

All data from sources are archived for future reference.
